title: We should not get carried away by Murali’s farewell – Sangakkara
content: As Muttiah Muralitharan prepares for his farewell Test, Sri Lanka captain Kumar Sangakkara has cautioned his team not to get carried away by the occasion and instead concentrate on beating India in Galle. “As a team, the best we can do for Murali is to make sure we don’t get too overwhelmed or carried away…
